langChoice: Hi! What language do you want?
feelingsMessage: Hi! How do you feel today?
feelingsMessagePast: Hi! How did you feel on:
experience: How can we make your experience better?
anonymousFeedback: Your feedback is pseudo anonymous. If you want a reply, please leave an email or a phone number.
AnsIsZinZenPrivate: Yes. Your data stays on your device by default.
ansIsZinZenExpensive: It's free - supported by donations. No ads. No deception.
iHaveNoMoreQuestions: I have no more questions for now.
dontAskAgain: Don't ask again for this action?
noDurationText:
Click again to enter
 or click the circle to edit

archive.header: Do you want to mark this goal completed?
archive.note: This goal will be moved to archive along with the subgoals. You can restore it from archive anytime.

delete.header: Do you want to delete this goal?
delete.note: You can always recover this from the Trash.

shareAnonymously.header: Do you want to share this goal pseudo anonymously?
shareAnonymously.note: Only this goal and its time related properties will be shared publicly :)

shareWithOne.header: Do you want to share this goal with one of your contacts?
shareWithOne.note: Every change you make on/under this goal will be shared with that person.

addHint.header: Do you want to add a hint to this goal?
addHint.note: A hint will be added to the goal. You can edit or delete it anytime.

deleteHint.header: Do you want to delete this hint?
deleteHint.note: You won't be able to recover it again.

reportHint.header: Do you want to report this hint?
reportHint.note: You will be notified when it's reported.

colabRequest.note: During collaboration, this goal will be added to your MyGoals, and any changes you make will be communicated to the other person.

delete.header: Do you want to delete this goal?
delete.note: This will end the collaboration and you will not receive any updates.

archive.header: Do you want to archive this goal?
archive.note: This will end the collaboration and you will not receive any updates.
